dt: {bc}capable of being perceived especially by the senses

pt: {sc}perceptible{/sc} {sc}sensible{/sc} {sc}palpable{/sc} {sc}tangible{/sc} {sc}appreciable{/sc} {sc}ponderable{/sc} mean apprehensible as real or existent. {sc}perceptible{/sc} applies to what can be discerned by the senses often to a minimal extent.

pt.t: a {it}perceptible{/it} difference in sound to a careful listener

pt: {sc}sensible{/sc} applies to whatever is clearly apprehended through the senses or impresses itself strongly on the mind.
{sc}palpable{/sc} applies either to what has physical substance or to what is obvious and unmistakable.

pt.t: the tension in the air was almost {it}palpable{/it}

pt: {sc}tangible{/sc} suggests what is capable of being handled or grasped both physically and mentally.
{sc}appreciable{/sc} applies to what is distinctly discernible by the senses or definitely measurable.
{sc}ponderable{/sc} suggests having definitely measurable weight or importance.

pt.t: exerted a {it}ponderable{/it} influence on world events

shortdef: capable of being perceived especially by the senses
